ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | evpmss.s | |- S = ( SymGrp ` D ) |
| 2 |  | evpmss.p | |- P = ( Base ` S ) |
| 3 |  | psgnevpmb.n | |- N = ( pmSgn ` D ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_psgnevpmb | |- ( D e. Fin -> ( F e. ( pmEven ` D ) <-> ( F e. P /\ ( N ` F ) = 1 ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simplbda | |- ( ( D e. Fin /\ F e. ( pmEven ` D ) ) -> ( N ` F ) = 1 ) |
